entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as having green eyes and knobbly knees. He is also shown to be looking at his family for the first time in his life.

entities.name: potters
entities.description: The Potters are described as smiling and waving at Harry.

relationships.description: Harry is looking at his family, the Potters, for the first time in his life.
The Potters are smiling and waving at Harry.
